title: Zelensky Is Under Pressure from Trump and Domestically
summary: Over nearly four years of wartime leadership, analysts say the Ukrainian leader has repeatedly played weak hands wisely. A U.S. peace plan may be his biggest test.

title: Trump Calls Ukraine Ungrateful, Again, for U.S. Support in War With Russia
summary: President Trump renewed his criticism of Ukraine’s government as emissaries from Kyiv and Washington met to discuss a plan to end the war.

title: Rubio Insists U.S. Authored the Ukraine Peace Plan
summary: The comment from Secretary of State Marco Rubio came after a group of U.S. lawmakers claimed that he said the plan was a Russian initiative, not a U.S. proposal.

title: Patel Under Scrutiny for Use of SWAT Teams to Protect His Girlfriend
summary: The F.B.I. director’s travel on government jets has contributed to growing questions inside the administration about whether he is using taxpayer-funded resources inappropriately.

title: At Harvard-Yale Game, Rivals Come Together Against Trump Administration Attacks
summary: Students and alumni set aside rivalries at the 141st Harvard-Yale football game on Saturday to summon support against attacks on higher education under the Trump administration.

title: Mamdani and Trump Tamp Down Fears Over National Guard in New York City
summary: In a Sunday interview on “Meet the Press,” Zohran Mamdani, the mayor-elect, said he had made a forceful case to the president that troops were not needed in the city.

title: Fact-Checking Trump’s Latest Claims on Affordability
summary: The president has made misleading statements about the cost of a Thanksgiving meal, breakfast and gasoline and about prices in general.

title: Tatiana Schlossberg, John F. Kennedy’s Granddaughter, Reveals Terminal Cancer Diagnosis
summary: Tatiana Schlossberg, a daughter of Caroline Kennedy, revealed a terminal cancer diagnosis in an essay published on the anniversary of her grandfather’s assassination.

title: One Undocumented Worker Used a Stolen Identity. Two Men Paid the Price.
summary: Thousands of undocumented workers rely on fraudulent Social Security numbers. One of them belonged to Dan Kluver.

title: Hedge Fund Titan Has a Turnaround Plan (for the Carolina Panthers)
summary: David Tepper, the founder of the $20 billion Appaloosa Management, may have finally cracked the winning code for his flagging N.F.L. team.

title: Best Thanksgiving Side Dishes | Thanksgiving Recipes 2025 | NYT Cooking
summary: Because we all know the green bean casserole, stuffing and mashed potatoes are the best part of the meal.

title: The Real Epstein Cover-Up
summary: Once again, we see how far this country will go to maintain the power of men at the expense of women’s bodies.

title: America’s Housing Crisis, in One Chart
summary: If we want more places for people to live, we’re going to have to get more creative.

title: Meet the Beatles, Again
summary: A music reporter revisits the documentary that made him fall in love with the Beatles, ahead of the film’s 30th-anniversary rerelease.

title: We Want to Know: What Are Your Pressing Questions About How Your Life Has Changed This Year Under Trump?
summary: Times journalists will bring you answers.

title: F.B.I. Letters Send Shivers Through California’s Political Inner Circle
summary: The indictment of Gov. Gavin Newsom’s former chief of staff shocked many power players in California. Now, some wonder how far the investigation will spread.

title: Titanic Passenger’s Pocket Watch Sells for $2.3 Million
summary: The watch belonged to Isidor Straus, a co-owner of Macy’s who was traveling first class on the Titanic with his wife when it sank in April 1912.

title: Retiring Before (or After) Your Partner? How to Navigate Money Issues
summary: Too many couples have “undiscussed assumptions” about how they’ll live and spend once they leave the work force, experts say.
